name: Re: Creacion
description: Re: Creacion is a game (Still in development) where you follow the story of a group of friends who seek to return home after entering a world of magic and fantasy in one of their adventures in school recess. ¿How will they achive it? ¿How did they even get there? ¿Will they all make it out alive? Well, you'll have to play this fun story full of puzzles, comedy and adventures to find out.
